channel.title: Continuous Delivery on What Bird Is That?
channel.description: Recent content in Continuous Delivery on What Bird Is That?

item.title: Reliable, Evolving, Agile, Lean
item.description: ./realblog Reliable Evolving Agile Lean Warning: Star Wars Quotes Software that survives. A lot of software today is not given a chance to survive. It’s written up, posted on the web, and taken down all within days. This kind of code is ‘firefly code’ and sometimes that’s what we need to get our message across. We know it’s only just barely working. We have factored that into our plan.
